title: The Silent Daughter Of A Duke And The Cold Emperor ~ The Child I Found In My Past Life Became The Emperor ~
alternative_title: Mukuchi na Koushaku Reijou to Reitetsu na Koutei ; Mukuchi na Koushaku Reijou to Reitetsu na Koutei - Zense Hirotta Kodomo ga Koutei ni Natte Imashita ; Mukuchina Koushaku Reijou to Reitetsuna Koutei~ Zense Hirotta Kodomo ga Koutei ni Natte Imashita~ ; The Boy I Loved Became the Jaded Emperor ; The Reserved Daughter of a Duke and the Cold-Headed Emperor ; The Reserved Daughter of a Duke and the Cold-Headed Emperor - The Child I Picked up in My Past Life Had Become an Emperor
status: Mukuchi na Koushaku Reijou to Reitetsu na Koutei ; Mukuchi na Koushaku Reijou to Reitetsu na Koutei - Zense Hirotta Kodomo ga Koutei ni Natte Imashita ; Mukuchina Koushaku Reijou to Reitetsuna Koutei~ Zense Hirotta Kodomo ga Koutei ni Natte Imashita~ ; The Boy I Loved Became the Jaded Emperor ; The Reserved Daughter of a Duke and the Cold-Headed Emperor ; The Reserved Daughter of a Duke and the Cold-Headed Emperor - The Child I Picked up in My Past Life Had Become an Emperor
description:
Description :
        A woman born with the face of a monster lived within a forest in solitude. One day, she saved a young boy from a magical beast, naming him Ham. The boy called the woman Pie, and the two lonely people lived together happily. However, it didn't last long. Pie, the only person who had loved Ham as well as being the person he loved the most, was killed right before his eyes. The boy discarded his identity as Ham and as Prince Alexei, he climbed his way up to becoming emperor for the sake of revenge. On the other hand, Pie was reborn as the duke's daughter, Eleonora, and became renowned for being a silent beauty with a certain secret. Thus, the two unknowingly reunited at a ball due to fate-?!
